languages.text: "Разве не видишь, что я хочу вас спасти?" {n}Мужчина крепко сжимает оружие.{/n} "Только Заря поможет нам! Почему ты этого не поймешь?" {n}Увидев вас, мужчина наводит на вас оружие. Другие мятежники делают то же самое.{/n} "Кто ты и зачем приш{mf|ел|ла}?"

traits.locale_text:
"Разве не видишь, Тилла, что я хочу вас спасти?" {n}Мужчина крепко сжимает оружие.{/n} "Только Истина поможет нам! Почему ты этого не поймешь?"
{n}Увидев вас, мужчина наводит на вас оружие. Другие мятежники делают то же самое.{/n} "Кто ты и зачем пришел?"

languages.text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"
languages.original_text: "Разве не видишь, что я хочу вас спасти?" {n}Мужчина крепко сжимает оружие.{/n} "Только Заря поможет нам! Почему ты этого не поймешь?" {n}Увидев вас, мужчина наводит на вас оружие. Другие мятежники делают то же самое.{/n} "Кто ты и зачем приш{mf|ел|ла}?"

traits.locale_text:
"Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?"
{n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. Other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why have you come?"

"Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?"
{n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. Other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why have you come?"

{n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you need?"

{n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you need?"

"Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

"Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

languages.text: "Begreift Ihr denn nicht, dass ich versuche, Euch zu retten?" {n}Der Mann umklammert mit festem Griff seine Waffe.{/n} "Nur Aurora kann uns helfen! Warum begreift Ihr das nicht?" {n}Als er dich sieht, richtet der Mann seine Waffe auf dich. Die anderen Aufständischen tun es ihm gleich.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr und was wollt Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

traits.locale_text:
"Begreift Ihr denn nicht, dass ich versuche, Euch zu retten?" {n}Der Mann umklammert mit festem Griff seine Waffe.{/n} "Nur Aurora kann uns helfen! Warum begreift Ihr das nicht?"
{n}Als er dich sieht, richtet der Mann seine Waffe auf dich. Die anderen Aufständischen tun es ihm gleich.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr und was wollt Ihr?"

languages.text: « Tu ne vois pas que j'essaie de vous sauver ? {n}réplique l'homme en serrant fermement son arme.{/n} Seule Aurore peut nous aider ! Est-ce trop dur à comprendre ? » {n}En vous voyant, l'homme pointe son arme sur vous. Les autres insurgés en font de même.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous et que voulez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

traits.locale_text: « Tu ne vois pas que j'essaie de vous sauver ? {n}réplique l'homme en serrant fermement son arme.{/n} Seule Aurore peut nous aider ! Est-ce trop dur à comprendre ? » {n}En vous voyant, l'homme pointe son arme sur vous. Les autres insurgés en font de même.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous et que voulez-vous ? »

languages.text:
“我是在努力救你啊！难道你还看不出来吗？”{n}那个男人握紧了武器。{/n}“只有‘极光’能帮助我们！你为什么就是不能理解呢？”
{n}他看到你之后，立刻将武器对准了你，其他叛乱分子也跟着照做。{/n}“你是什么人？为什么会在这里？”
languages.original_text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

traits.locale_text:
“我是在努力救你啊！难道你还看不出来吗？”{n}那个男人握紧了武器。{/n}“只有‘极光’能帮助我们！你为什么就是不能理解呢？”
{n}他看到你之后，立刻将武器对准了你，其他叛乱分子也跟着照做。{/n}“你是什么人？为什么会在这里？”

languages.text: 「我々がお前たちを救おうとしていることがわからないのか？」{n}男は武器をぎゅっと握りしめた。{/n}「オーロラだけが俺たちを救ってくれるんだ！なぜそれが理解できないんだ？」{n}あなたを見るや、男は武器をあなたに向けた。他の反乱者たちも同じようにした。{/n}「お前は誰だ。何が欲しいんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

traits.locale_text:
「我々がお前たちを救おうとしていることがわからないのか？」{n}男は武器をぎゅっと握りしめた。{/n}「オーロラだけが俺たちを救ってくれるんだ！なぜそれが理解できないんだ？」
{n}あなたを見るや、男は武器をあなたに向けた。他の反乱者たちも同じようにした。{/n}「お前は誰だ。何を求めている？」

languages.text: «¿No ves que intento salvaros?». {n}El hombre agarra su arma con fuerza.{/n} «¡Solo Aurora puede ayudarnos! ¿Por qué no lo entiendes?». {n}Al verte, el hombre te apunta con su arma. Los otros insurgentes hacen lo mismo.{/n} «¿Quién eres y qué quieres?».
languages.original_text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

traits.locale_text:
«¿No ves que intento salvaros?». {n}El hombre agarra su arma con fuerza.{/n} «¡Solo Aurora puede ayudarnos! ¿Por qué no lo entiendes?».
{n}Al verte, el hombre te apunta con su arma. Los otros insurgentes hacen lo mismo.{/n} «¿Quién eres y qué necesitas?».

languages.text: "Sizi kurtarmaya çalıştığımı göremiyor musun?" {n}Adam silahını sıkıca kavrıyor.{/n} "Bize sadece Aurora yardım edebilir! Niye anlamıyorsun?" {n}Adam, seni görünce silahını sana doğrultuyor. Keza diğer isyancılar da öyle.{/n} "Kimsin, ne istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Can't you see I'm trying to save you?" {n}The man clutches his weapon tightly.{/n} "Only Aurora can help us! Why can't you understand that?" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and what do you want?"

traits.locale_text: "Sizi kurtarmaya çalıştığımı göremiyor musun?" {n}Adam silahını sıkıca kavrıyor.{/n} "Bize sadece Aurora yardım edebilir! Niye anlamıyorsun?" {n}Adam, seni görünce silahını sana doğrultuyor. Keza diğer isyancılar da öyle.{/n} "Kimsin, ne istiyorsun?"
